dct_title_s: Totius Americ√¶ Descriptio. (pag: I  TAB. I)
dct_description_sm: California as an island on Briggs model and with no detail to north.Another map "[page]10 Tab.III." shows "Bestrou Anien" to north of California and "Terre de Iesso" to northwest.Issued in his:  Kort Beskrifning Om PROVINCIEN Nya Swerige uti AMERICA, som nu fortjden af the Engelske kallas PENSYLVANIA.  Af larde och trowardige mans skrifter och berattelser ihopaletad och sammanskrefwen, samt med ath skillige figurer utzirad af THOMAS CAMPANIUS HOLM . -- Stockholm : Tryckt uti Kongl. boktr. hos S. Wankijfs ankia, med egen bekostnad, af J.H. Werner, 1702.    Text in Swedish.	 	Pictorial engraved additional title page, a1-[a4],b[1]-[b4], 190 p., [1] : 4 engraved maps (2 fold.), 2 pl., 10 woodcut ill.(including 2 maps)  19.3 x 15 cm.Title in red and black; title vignette.Errors in paging: p. [50] is numbered 10, [112] numbered 111, [160] numbered 601, [183] numbered 175, [184] numbered 174.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Glen McLaughlin Map Collection of California as an Island courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
